summary: Unenchanted staves and heartsones crafting at the forge using flawless gems and rare metals. Appropriate master perks required.
descriptionHtml:
Mod designated mainly for people using custom homes with staff enchanter who don't want to be dependent on trading with Neloth.

I have found similar mods existing, but these are utilising staff enchanter itself to create unenchanted staff, which by my opinion don't make much sense. Not only using "enchanter" to create something "unenchanted" sounds stupid, but also creating process seems to be unnecessarily two-step.

The staves are created with materials resembling the staves graphics as much as possible while trying to be fair at the same time. Receipes works as following:

Unenchanted alteration staff: 2 orichalcum ignots + 1 flawless garnet, master alteration required
Unenchanted conjuration staff: 2 ebony ignots + 1 flawless amethyst, master conjuration required
Unenchanted destruction staff: 2 malachite ignots + 1 flawless emerald, master destruction required
Unenchanted illusion staff: 2 corundum ignots + 1 flawless saphire, master illusion required
Unenchanted restoration staff: 2 diamond ignots + 1 flawless moonstone, master restoration required
Heart Stone: 2 quicksilver ignots + 1 flawless ruby, extra effect required

Installation:

unpack the file, copy it to the Skyrim data folder and allow it in your skyrim launcher or mod manager

Dragonborn DLC is required
author: proud2Bnerd
